Properties.Description: Supports SideFX Labs Vertex Animation Textures Soft-Body Deformation (Soft) mode. On the Material's Details panel, turn off Tangent Space Normal and set Num Customized UVs to 5. Surface texture UVs are accessible at TexCoord[0]. (All native parameters are inside this Material Function. Create a Material Instance to gain access to the parameters. Avoid creating your own parameters outside this Material Function with names that clash with the parameter names inside this Material Function.)
